page.title: 09The New By-pass
page.content: When we went to ask questions at {Preseli Dist.Council's Planning Dept. these were some of the things we were able to ask, and so found out about:_ Why are you building another by-pass through Haverfordwest? ...Because of the ever increasing amount of{TRAFFIC CONGESTION}at the base of {^ Prendergast Hill ^} We hope that this will improve the situation. Will the buildings that are being knocked down be rebuilt elsewhere? ...No, I do not think so. Will the by-pass be a short cut? ...No, because it is just about the same distance...but it should be {[[[[[[[[[[!! QUICKER !!]]]]]]]]]]]] as you will not get held up by slow moving traffic. Will Bridge Street be affected? ...No, but in the future I think the Council will pedestrianise it.
